english.segment1: I know my Father made you mad. In your eyes I see the end
english.segment2: Do your knees shake at the thought of those dark clouds. They're rolling in
english.segment3: And I hear the trumpets wail. Israel Armageddon begin
english.segment4: Let Him see your hands outstretched. To Him
english.segment5: This time your blood will run. This time your blood will run dry
english.segment6: And who are you spitting at. And who are you spitting at
english.segment7: Bring Your glory. Bring Your fire. Bring Your blood. Bring Zion. I wanna see it. Your face. I wanna feel You. When fire burns. It's from the sky. When fire burns. The sky
english.segment8: It's over. When fire burns. It's over. And it's from the sky. It's over. When fire burns. It's over. The sky
english.segment9: And let the blood fall. Let it fall here. And let the blood fall. Let his blood fall here
